entries.title: Steve Bannon Issues Warning to Donald Trump
entries.description: Bannon took issue with Senator Lindsey Graham's involvement with an upcoming Trump campaign event in South Carolina.

entries.title: Fox News Host Asks if Biden Committed 'Treason'

entries.title: GOP Rep. Calls for Educating Marjorie Taylor Greene About Conspiracies
entries.description: "She realizes she doesn't know everything and wants to learn and become more of a team player," Michael McCaul said Sunday.

entries.title: Putin Ally Warns New Anti-American 'Military Alliance' May Emerge
entries.description: Former Russian President Dmitry Medvedev said on Sunday that the coalition could follow a "protracted" Ukraine war.

entries.title: Idaho Suspect Returned to Scene for One of These Two Reasons: Ex-FBI Agent
entries.description: "I envision him waiting for the news to break, and out of sheer curiosity, I think he went back to revel in his crime," Jennifer Coffindaffer said Sunday.

entries.title: Michelle Obama, Newsom 'In the Wings' Amid Biden Scandal: Trump Lawyer
entries.description: Jenna Ellis told Newsweek that Democrats now know that they "cannot possibly run him [Joe Biden] again in 2024" as his classified documents situation develops.

entries.title: Top Democrats Slam Biden's Handling of Classified Documents: 'Unacceptable'
entries.description: Two prominent Senate Democrats also called the president's handling of the documents "irresponsible," but still praised his cooperation with investigators.

entries.title: Russian Analyst: Tucker Carlson Is 'One American' Who Shouldn't Be Killed
entries.description: During the Russian TV segment, a panelist pushed for "nuclear confrontation" with the U.S. while another said Ukraine is a "prelude" to World War III.

entries.title: Joe Biden Responds to Monterey Park Mass Shooting, Suspect Remains at Large
entries.description: The president said on Sunday that he's "monitoring this situation closely as it develops."

entries.title: Russian State TV Host Says Country Entering 'Holy War Mode'
entries.description: The war is moving into "a completely different mode," according to Vladimir Solovyov.

entries.title: GOP Rep. Confronted on Downplaying Trump Documents Probe Then Ripping Biden
entries.description: "This inequality, this hypocritical aspect, especially from President Biden, having condemned Trump and then having done the same thing," Rep. Mike Turner said.

entries.title: Russia Will Struggle To Staff and Equip Any Expanded Army: U.K.
entries.description: Russia's Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu wants to boost the country's army to 1.5 million troops.

entries.title: Joe Manchin Won't Rule Out 2024 Run: 'Everything Is on the Table'
entries.description: The West Virginia senator on Sunday did not clarify if he would run as a Democrat or a Republican.

entries.title: Donald Trump, Lauren Boebert Lead Fury at Joe Biden's Latest Documents
entries.description: Colorado representative Boebert said the White House had lost "any remaining shred of credibility."

entries.title: Trump Uses Monterey Park Mass Shooting to Defend Jan. 6 Rioters
entries.description: The former president has previously pledged to pardon January 6 participants if he's reelected in 2024.

entries.title: BetMGM: Bonus Code NEWSWEEK for Bengals-Bills Scores $1,000 Bet Insurance

entries.title: Ex-Russian Commander Explains Why Putin's Success in Ukraine Is Impossible
entries.description: Igor Girkin said that since Russia has classified the invasion as a "special military operation" rather than a war, leaders are limited in disciplinary actions.

entries.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Takes Aim at Merrick Garland Over Atlanta Unrest

entries.title: Trump Keeps Providing 'Incriminating Evidence' Against Himself: Kirschner
entries.description: Former federal prosecutor Glenn Kirschner said everything the ex-president says related to his classified documents case is an "admission by a party-opponent."

entries.title: Shock Over What Woman Put in Neighbor's Trash Can: 'Disgusting'
entries.description: Several users on Reddit criticized the pet owner's action, while others were more understanding, with one writing, "garbage is garbage."

entries.title: Senior Dog's First Zoomies Since Friend Died Breaks Hearts Online

entries.description: Conservative commentator Ineitha Lynnette Hardaway's death was announced in January.

entries.title: Former Binge Eater Reveals How She Dropped 200 Pounds in Nine Months

entries.title: Grandma Saves Elderly Family Dog From Euthanasia After It Bit Grandchildren
entries.description: "Lana needed someone to pay attention to her needs," Margaret Myers, owner of the 16-year-old Chihuahua mix, told Newsweek.

entries.title: I'm Broke and Desperately Need My Inheritance—What Should I Do?

entries.title: Prince Harry's Attack on the Royal Family Has Backfired Spectacularly
entries.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle began 2023 with a tobogan slide down from human rights champions to figures of frost bitten ridicule—but there may be a way out.

entries.title: The Startling Similarities Between Joe Biden and Lyndon Johnson

entries.title: The Fight to Bring Abortion Back
entries.description: Sunday marks the 50th anniversary of Roe v. Wade. Now that it is dead, how do abortion rights activists intend to continue the fight for reproductive autonomy?

entries.description: This includes some Disney-brand sanitizers and others from Marvel and Star Wars that were made in China.

entries.title: Biden's Classified Documents Problem Just Got Worse

entries.title: Tech Limitations Made Ruling Out SCOTUS Leaker 'Impossible': Report
entries.description: Cybersecurity expert Mark Lanterman told Reuters that even having highly secure networks would still not be enough to protect against leaking information.
